```{r}
#| label:setup
library(flextable)
options(
  paged.print = FALSE,
  digits = 3
  )
```

```{r}
# Sample size
n <- 5
set.seed(94665)

# Generate data
data.frame(
  i = 1:n,
  x = sample(1:10, size = n, replace = TRUE) # draw integers
) |> 
  as_flextable()
```


# Summering
```{r}
data.frame(
  i = 1:4,
  x = c(7, 4, 10, 2)
) |> 
  as_flextable()
```
